properties.validation-details-attribute-name:
/identifiant_organisation IS NOT NULL
AND /Nom_etablissement IS NOT NULL
AND /Code_region IS NOT NULL
AND /Region IS NOT NULL

properties.distinctQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT 
  identifiant_organisation, 
  raison_sociale_site AS nom_etablissement, 
  code_commune AS code_region, 
  commune AS region
FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE identifiant_organisation IS NOT NULL
  AND raison_sociale_site IS NOT NULL
  AND code_commune IS NOT NULL
  AND commune IS NOT NULL

attributes-to-ignore-regex.name: attributes-to-ignore-regex
attributes-to-ignore-regex.displayName: Attributes to Ignore by Regular Expression

attributes-to-log-regex.name: attributes-to-log-regex
attributes-to-log-regex.displayName: Attributes to Log by Regular Expression

properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO dim_etablissement (identifiant_organisation, nom_etablissement, code_region, region)
VALUES ('${identifiant_organisation}', '${nom_etablissement}', '${code_region}', '${region}');

labels.label: Entrepôt de données (processus pour récupérer les données JSON et les envoyer en requête SQL)
